snippet: An architect and an interior designer have created an online database of hazardous building materials.
abstract: Architect Peter Syrett and interior designer Chris Youssef describe what led them to create an online database of hazardous building materials, and offer tips for consumers seeking to find safe products for their home.
lead_paragraph: An architect and an interior designer have created an online database of hazardous building materials.

headline.seo: An Online Database of Hazardous Building Materials
headline.main: To Help Make Sure Your Home Is Healthy, an Ingredients List
headline.print_headline: To Help Make Sure Your Home Is Healthy, an Ingredients List
